body_html:
@madsdk - Seeing from you log:
Non-zero return code(127) when executing 'C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c "patch -p1 -d C:/users/cm/_bazel_cm/xv6zejqw/external/kafka -i C:/tensorflow/third_party/kafka/config.patch"'
Please make sure that you don't add single quote or double quote to "repo.bzl ".
The only necessary change seems to be Timeout value.
Adding quote/double quote will generate 'No such file or directory' error.
From what I found, the original line below is correct:
cmd = [bazel_sh, "-l", "-c", " ".join(cmd)]

body:
@madsdk - Seeing from you log:
`
Non-zero return code(127) when executing 'C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c "patch -p1 -d C:/users/cm/_bazel_cm/xv6zejqw/external/kafka -i C:/tensorflow/third_party/kafka/config.patch"'
`
Please make sure that you don't add single quote or double quote to "repo.bzl ".
**The only necessary change seems to be Timeout value.**
Adding quote/double quote will generate 'No such file or directory' error.
From what I found, the original line below is correct:
`
cmd = [bazel_sh, "-l", "-c", " ".join(cmd)]
`
